description.purpose: User says 'close this thing' without clarity, leading to confusion

instructions.unknown_info: You want to ensure your debit card can be locked or unlocked without issues.
instructions.task_instructions: You vaguely ask to 'close this thing', leaving it unclear whether you mean your account or your card, and later file a dispute.
